sentences.en: At the moment these shares are worth zilch.
sentences.cn: 现在这些股票一文不值。

sentences.en: It has zilch chance of happening.
The team's morale fell to zilch owing to the unexpected defeat.
sentences.cn: 由于这次出乎意料的失利,球队的士气低落到极点.

words.tran_cn: 零，无；无价值之物；小人物

trans.tran_cn: 微不足道的事物（或人），小人物，无，零
